string-array.name: time_line_female
string-array.item: 3~m| Find a date| Research dresses and fashion trends that suit you
1~m| Schedule makeup| Schedule hair| Schedule mani/pedi| Organize after-party plans
2~w| Make final dress alterations| Confirm all appointments
1~d| Pick up your date’s boutonniere| Charge your phone| Charge your camera
